title: Guesthouse private entrance
posting_body: ['Welcome', 'Non Smoking', 'No pets', 'Lease a new guest house studio apartment home for $1500 per month all included.', 'A Security $1,500 deposit is required on approved credit.', 'This is a spacious apartment with quality hardwood floors in bedroom, easy care tile style flooring in bathroom, granite counter tops, designed to give you the ambiance of carefree living with all the comforts, conveniences and amenities of a fine home.', 'Nice private entrance, private bathroom, private kitchen, full size fridge, ac unit air/heat, ample closet space.', 'Water, Electricity, Trash, Included.', 'INTERIOR AMENITIES', '1 Bedrooms with private bathroom', 'Hardwood style floors', 'Ample closet space', 'Stove', 'Refrigerator', 'Microwave', 'A/C cooling unit-Heat Unit', 'High-speed internet (extra charge)', 'Full Furniture', 'Non-smoking', 'No pets', 'Easy Street parking', 'Great Location', 'Call today for more details or to schedule an appointment:', 'Price subject to change without notice.', 'Cut your commute down to something reasonable with easy access to both the 405 and 101 freeways along with endless ways to navigate the many very beautiful San Fernando Valley residential neighborhoods.', 'Your new home will be conveniently located close to the Van Nuys and Burbank Airports, California State University Northridge, Sherman Oaks Galleria, Universal Studios, Universal City Walk, Hollywood Bowl, and Magic Mountain.', 'Outdoor enthusiasts will enjoy our proximity to the really spectacular Lake Balboa and Sepulveda Dam recreational areas.', 'Also a short drive away is the Balboa Sports Center and several world class golf course.', 'This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 500 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Amenities', '- Furniture Rental', '- Public Transportation', '- Short Term Lease available', '- High Speed Internet (extra)', '- Accept Electronic Payments', '- Street Parking', '- Walk to Shopping, Dining, and Outdoor activities', '- Easy Freeway Access to 101, 405, 170 Freeways.']
